subject: Pedal issues
description_text:
Hi. I got my pedals put together and am trying to run them on AMS 2. The
simsonn software sees them and let me calibrate them. However, windows and
AMS 2 do not see them.

Also they are a fire hazard and the control box is prone to sparking.

I have attached videos b

Can you help?

Ryan Saylor
505-500-4LAW (4529)

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Saylor,  Regarding AMS 2 support, I will have the software run the test again. The motor’s 24V power supply is a safe voltage; sparks generated during capacitor charging pose no safety risk and will not damage the mainboard.
